price: 27. [Fir‘aun (Pharaoh)] said: "Verily, your Messenger who has been sent to you is a madman!"
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
